title: What happened to "Stats" tab on my profile?
body:
Usually when I click on my profile I'd get a breakdown of my stats from the season/ last 25 games/ last season. Including K/D and money distribution etc. 
It seems to have disappeared from my, and others', profiles. 

Is this a patch thing I missed or a bug lol?

replies.body: Hey guys, any updates on this problem?. I still can't see my stats tab
Yeah I can't find stats either, and I love them. ;-;
For me it is loading in loop and never display something
Mines also gone. Please tell me there is a fix for this...

Mine just won't load and is being like this for months now.
It just looks like they will be getting rid of the feature, as no word on the subject has given by Riot.
